customer_reviews.title: Smokin deal
customer_reviews.text: Smokin deal !!! All I needed was an extra battery I've already got the full set. Now for about the same price I've got an extra impact drill and charger. If you look at the white makita set that usually runs $179-220 it comes with 2 half size batteries. This comes with 1 battery that has as much power as the other two combined and it's about half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne L.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for home and woodshop use
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic impact driver. Plenty of power for all sorts of tasks. I use it for household and woodshop work, and I've yet to find a fastener it can't handle, this includes coarse 3" deck screws, though I don't think it could handle much larger (nor could my other cordless drills or drivers) At this price, it beats out any of the 12v Bosch stuff, and is much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bonifaci

customer_reviews.title: Most Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for everything from driving 3" deck screws, to installing kitchen cabinets, and it works great. So much better at driving long fasteners than a drill/driver, and the number of fasteners it will drive on a single charge is truly amazing. I love it. Plus, the battery charges super-fast, and is interchangeable with the ones for my(or any other Makita 18V Li-Ion tool, for that matter), so no worries about ever running out of charge and having to wait. Also, I'd highly recommend getting theat the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Must have, get this one if you don't have one
customer_reviews.text: I've had this Makita impact driver for approximately a year. This was one of those purchases that was both a screaming good value and a very usable and versatile tool. My friend who works in construction and has the brushless version paid me compliments when he used mine. There is a difference in specs somewhere, but the lower price of my impact gun had no negative feedback from someone using the next step up as their daily driver at work. Wish I would have owned this earlier as it is very handy to have on hand. At $99 this deal has paid for itself over and over again
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This kit was well priced, and the tool definitely does the job... and does it well. It surprises me how well this impact can break some bolts free, saving me time and effort. I can't imagine how much longer each job would take without this. This is definitely a must-buy for any automotive technician.

customer_reviews.title: Really, really like this tool

No rounding out a Phillips screw unless you really try to. Very impressive.

customer_reviews.text: Ive been looking to buy a Makita for awhile now but most local stores want $300+. Found this deal and thought there must be something im not seeing, waaaay too cheap. However, upon receiving my Makita, I couldn't be happier. Amazing ergonomics, light, well balanced, and powerful. Cheaper than my Craftsman I bought from Sears, and definetly higher quality. Im going to buy another for a friend.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for Makita
customer_reviews.text: Great price for Makita, and everyone knows Makita is the best. have used their tools for many years .. and don't let my crews touch them .. lol .. give them Ryobe ... cheap (they destroy everything on a site) ... just don't touch my Makita ...

product_meta.title: Makita XDT042 18V LXT Lithium-Ion Cordless Impact Driver Kit (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Style:Impact driverThe Makita 18V LXT Lithium-Ion Cordless Impact Driver (model XDT042) delivers power and speed in a compact size for a full range of driving and fastening tasks. The XDT042 features a Makita-built 4-pole motor with variable speed (0-2,300 RPM and 0-3,200 IPM) that delivers 1,420 in. lbs. of Max Torque. At only 5-7/16" long and 3.3 pounds (with battery), the XDT042 has a compact and ergonomic design with less weight for reduced operator fatigue, and a rubberized soft grip for increased comfort on the job. The built-in L.E.D. light illuminates the job area for applications in dark spaces and close quarters. Makita's entire line-up of impact drivers including the XDT042 is engineered with a proprietary hammer and anvil impact mechanism that is manufactured using the best raw materials with the highest quality steel, as well as a unique heat-hardening process for maximum fastening and driving power. The XDT042 is engineered for a wide range of driving and fastening applications. The combination of power and performance in a compact size makes the XDT042 ideal for any pro contractor who requires a best-in-class engineered compact cordless impact driver.
